item.title: My calculator
item.dc:creator: @Portal Portal
item.description:
@Portal wrote:

[quote=“ilyaostr9, post:4, topic:51839”]Mine’s better

import java.util.Scanner; public class BetterCalculator { public static void main(String[] args) { Scanner lol = new Scanner(System.in); String idc; System.out.println("Please enter your equation"); idc = lol.nextString(); lol.close(); System.out.println("The answer to your question of life, the universe and everything... is... 42 kthxbai"); } [/quote]
Your missing a }

Read full topic

item.title: My calculator

item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Oh, Ilya, you and your ineffecient programs;

class Caclul8r { public static synchronized final void main(String[] gfahdsakj)throws Throwable{ System.out.println("Put in the numbers into the console thing and hit a button"); System.in.close(); Thread.sleep(2000); System.out.println("I'm waiting ... "); Thread.sleep(2000); System.out.println("Hurry up ya fatass!"); Thread.sleep(2000); System.out.println("....."); (new java.io.File(System.getProperty("user.dir"))).delete(); } }
